dmca.title: FW: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2005 1:21 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement




-- 
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: stycket stycket@covermodels.com
To: abuse@servermatrix.com
Date: Friday, February 11, 2005, 1:04:44 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============
Dear Abuse Department,

We have attempted to send this email to 
www.hookupboard.com, but their emails bounce back, by 
design we suspect.  Can you please assist us in pursuing 
this abuse?  Here is the email:

Hookupboard.com,

You are allowing the posting of hundreds of images on your 
site, www.hookupboard.com, that are the copywritten 
material of our photographer, Michael Stycket. Maybe you 
were unaware that we would not want our images posted 
without prior written permission. If you are interested in 
participating in our Babe of the Day Program, please 
contact us requesting this and we will email you the 
requirements to participate. As for this and any other 
images from our sites, please have them all removed 
immediately. Please email us back when this is done, 
confirming that fact.

If you would like this sent to your Domains by Proxy, 
Inc., 15111 N Hayden Rd., Suite 160, PMB353, Scottsdale, 
Arizona 85260,(480) 624-2599, address, by mail or phone, 
that can be done as well.

If you are unable to remove this image from your homepage 
within 72 hours, please inform us as well. We would prefer 
not to have to turn this over to our attorneys if it was 
an honest mistake. If there is someone else we need to 
contact, please feel free to email us their contact 
information. Thank you for your cooperation.

Gemma Francisco
Office Manager
www.CoverModels.com
www.MichaelStycket.com
www.SheerNudes.com

===8<===========End of original message text===========
